command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&     ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/8/a/3/dataset_8a38e435-f1e9-4af2-a666-27a25d2d23d7.dat' infile && ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/_metadata_files/e/8/b/metadata_e8bf61e4-d5f8-4849-8d42-be56c453952f.dat' infile.bai &&         sample_fragment=`samtools idxstats infile | awk '{s+=$4+$3} END {frac=s/20; print(frac > 1 ? 26116+1/frac : ".0")}'` &&  samtools view -@ $addthreads -b    -s ${sample_fragment}   -o outfile      infile

params.mode: {"__current_case__": 1, "filter_config": {"cigarcons": "", "cond_region": {"__current_case__": 0, "select_region": "no"}, "cond_rg": {"__current_case__": 0, "select_rg": "no"}, "exclusive_filter": null, "exclusive_filter_all": null, "inclusive_filter": null, "library": null, "quality": ""}, "output_options": {"__current_case__": 0, "adv_output": {"collapsecigar": false, "readtags": []}, "complementary_output": false, "output_format": {"__current_case__": 0, "oformat": "input"}, "reads_report_type": "retained"}, "outtype": "selected_reads", "subsample_config": {"subsampling_mode": {"__current_case__": 1, "seed": "", "select_subsample": "target", "target": "20"}}}
